title: Summon Demon
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Opens a gate to the realm of Pandemonium and draws forth one of its inhabitants to serve the caster for a time.***“'Tis now the very witching time of night, When churchyards yawn and hell itself breathes out Contagion to this world.”* -William Shakespeare, \_The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark\_, III, 2." |

**Summon Demon** is a monster-only [Summonings](/Summonings "Summonings") spell which summons a single [common demon](/Common_demon "Common demon") (tier-[3](/3 "3") or -[4](/4 "4")) to do the caster's bidding. Such demons are manageable individually, but the variety of possible summons can cause issues if you leave the summoner to their own devices. Certain demons may also be more problematic than others ([chaos](/Chaos "Chaos")-[branded](/Brand "Brand") attacks from [chaos spawn](/Chaos_spawn "Chaos spawn"), [Malmutate](/Malmutate "Malmutate") from [neqoxecs](/Neqoxec "Neqoxec"), heavy [cold](/Cold "Cold") damage from [ice devils](/Ice_devil "Ice devil"), etc).

As with any summoning spell, the best way to get rid of the summons is by killing the summoner (though [Yara's Violent Unravelling](/Yara%27s_Violent_Unravelling "Yara's Violent Unravelling") will do in a pinch).

The following enemies cast Summon Demon:

- e [![Deep elf demonologist.png](/images/5/58/Deep_elf_demonologist.png)](/File:Deep_elf_demonologist.png) **[Deep elf demonologist](/Deep_elf_demonologist "Deep elf demonologist")**
- @ [![Frances.png](/images/8/83/Frances.png)](/File:Frances.png) **[Frances](/Frances "Frances")**
- @ [![Hellbinder.png](/images/0/08/Hellbinder.png)](/File:Hellbinder.png) **[Hellbinder](/Hellbinder "Hellbinder")**
- K [![Kobold demonologist.png](/images/f/f5/Kobold_demonologist.png)](/File:Kobold_demonologist.png) **[Kobold demonologist](/Kobold_demonologist "Kobold demonologist")**
- M [![Mummy priest.png](/images/0/0f/Mummy_priest.png)](/File:Mummy_priest.png) **[Mummy priest](/Mummy_priest "Mummy priest")**
- 8 [![Obsidian statue.png](/images/a/a0/Obsidian_statue.png)](/File:Obsidian_statue.png) **[Obsidian statue](/Obsidian_statue "Obsidian statue")**
- o [![Orc high priest.png](/images/b/b1/Orc_high_priest.png)](/File:Orc_high_priest.png) **[Orc high priest](/Orc_high_priest "Orc high priest")**
- o [![Orc sorcerer.png](/images/c/c6/Orc_sorcerer.png)](/File:Orc_sorcerer.png) **[Orc sorcerer](/Orc_sorcerer "Orc sorcerer")**

The following enemies may be able to cast Summon Demon, depending on their spell set:

- & [![Pandemonium lord.png](/images/c/c6/Pandemonium_lord.png)](/File:Pandemonium_lord.png) **[Pandemonium lord](/Pandemonium_lord "Pandemonium lord")** (8.4% chance)

## History

| [![Summon demon.png](/images/c/c5/Summon_demon.png)](/File:Summon_demon.png) Summon Demon |                                                                  |
| :---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                                     | 5                                                                |
| School1                                                                                   | [Summoning](/Summonings "Summonings")                            |
| Source(s)                                                                                 | - [Book of Summonings](/Book_of_Summonings "Book of Summonings") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                               | 4                                                                |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                 | 0                                                                |
| Power Cap                                                                                 | 200                                                              |
| Summons Limit                                                                             | 3                                                                |
| Range                                                                                     | Self                                                             |
| Flags                                                                                     | Unholy, Selfench, Mons Abjure                                    |

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), Summon Demon was castable by players. Demons summoned by this spell had a chance to spawn hostile.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14") spell power didn't affect the chance to summon a stronger demon.
html:
Summon Demon

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Opens a gate to the realm of Pandemonium and draws forth one of its inhabitants to serve the caster for a time.

“'Tis now the very witching time of night,
When churchyards yawn and hell itself breathes out
Contagion to this world.”

-William Shakespeare, _The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark_, III, 2."

Summon Demon is a monster-only Summonings spell which summons a single common demon (tier-3 or -4) to do the caster's bidding. Such demons are manageable individually, but the variety of possible summons can cause issues if you leave the summoner to their own devices. Certain demons may also be more problematic than others (chaos-branded attacks from chaos spawn, Malmutate from neqoxecs, heavy cold damage from ice devils, etc).

As with any summoning spell, the best way to get rid of the summons is by killing the summoner (though Yara's Violent Unravelling will do in a pinch).

The following enemies cast Summon Demon:

  • e Deep elf demonologist
  • @ Frances
  • @ Hellbinder
  • K Kobold demonologist
  • M Mummy priest
  • 8 Obsidian statue
  • o Orc high priest
  • o Orc sorcerer

The following enemies may be able to cast Summon Demon, depending on their spell set:

  • & Pandemonium lord (8.4% chance)

History

 Summon Demon
Level 5
School1 Summoning
Source(s)
  • Book of Summonings
Casting noise 4
Spell noise 0
Power Cap 200
Summons Limit 3
Range Self
Flags Unholy, Selfench, Mons Abjure
  • Prior to 0.27, Summon Demon was castable by players. Demons summoned by this spell had a chance to spawn hostile.
  • Prior to 0.14 spell power didn't affect the chance to summon a stronger demon.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Summon_Demon&oldid=58565"

Certain demons may also be more problematic than others ([[chaos]]-[[brand]]ed attacks from [[chaos spawn]], [[Malmutate]] from [[neqoxec]]s, heavy [[cold]] damage from [[ice devil]]s, etc).
